heading: it's ... getting ... closer
subheading: from peace corps relocations to corporate name changes, last-minute y2k preparations are falling into place. but are they enough? by joanna glasner.
author: joanna glasner
text: the final days before the new year are winding down with a flurry of last-minute precautions, as everyone from iranian government officials to nasa to the peace corps hones their plan of action for y2k. a few dispatches from around the planet:
